attributes.title: no🤍
attributes.review: When i downloaded the app dried up cheeto was holding his fist. kinda scared me. reading all the reviews they all said that it hacked their phone. so i didn’t log in.  i wouldn’t have anyways because  the ✨freedom✨ that my color friends have today is nothing and trump needs to fix that. xoxo we love mr. obama🤍

attributes.title: How rude
attributes.review: So just yesterday I was downloading this app to support our 🧚🏼‍♀️beautiful orange president🧚🏼‍♀️ and the first thing I saw when I got into the app was an Oompa Loompa looking foot. Then it started making me go crazy. Next thing I knew I was.....was licking feet. Please get this all deleted immediately it is making people go crazy! 🥱

attributes.title: what’s going on?!?!?
attributes.review: all i wanted to do was support this 🧡president🧡 but i was greeted by horrible hate speech after the app FINALLY downloaded after a WEEK!!!!! violent hate speech coming towards me as a woman. even worse, my mother dropped DEAD but before this happened, she mumbled “this is because of that damned TRUMP APP!!!!!!” i blame this app for the death of my mother.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: donald trump is a puss baby who’s one of the worst presidents we’ve had with almost every negative quality. i downloaded it because i was told i would get a boyfriend but instead of a boyfriend, trumps administration showed up at my door and shot my mother. she’s now dead. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!! it will kill your family!!!!!!

this app is supper scary the first thing i saw when i opened it was an orange and it had no warning that it contained graphic images also he asked for my number i thought he was married i never thought our president would cheat on his wife like that smh. this app is horrible overall if i could give it zero stars i would. this app is also very offensive to people who are actually okay and know that our president is a horrible person who does horrible stuff like being a pedo and keeping kids in cages.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is the worst I have ever downloaded. I just wanted to be able to show my support to the best president of all time but it took so long to download and the app is totally slow and confusing. This app must be banned! It is a waste of time and a terrible thing for American society.

attributes.title: Paralyzed from the brain up
attributes.review: I implore you not to get this app. From the second i set up a profile and open the home page, the suggested articles imminently paralyzed my brain. The doctors said it was a medicine mystery but my spiritual mother said the sacrilegious ideas that I read imminently summoned the devil and killed my soul. I repeat: DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR BE BRAIN PARALYZED.

attributes.title: Gen Z for the win babiiii
attributes.review:
I am appalled. I opened the app to see a washed up soggy orange Cheeto puff smiling at the camera. I thought this was going to be a regal man but it turns out this game is just a horror app with an evil orange blob as the face of it. I was so scared that I burned my phone in the dumpster behind a dirty diaper factory. 
   There are some amazing apps on the market 🧚🏼‍♀️✨🧚🏼‍♀️ this is not one of them

attributes.title: App won’t fully load.
attributes.review: Every time I go onto this app it allows a few minutes where I can interact with it. After the first few minutes the app kicks me off and I am brought to my home screen. My other apps don't do this so I know it’s not my phone.

attributes.title: This app is the worst
attributes.review: Literally took a day to download them when I tried to open it it said I couldn’t because I didn’t have enough space so I clear out some space in my phone and open it just so the app can crash repeatedly. I’m over it
